TheWarrior:Shield.NAME: Shield
TheWarrior:Shield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! * X block. You cannot attack this turn.

TheWarrior:PrepareToCombo.NAME: Prepare To Combo
TheWarrior:PrepareToCombo.DESCRIPTION: Start next combo as if you already played a card.
TheWarrior:PrepareToCombo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Start next combo as if you already played 2 cards.

TheWarrior:Fatigue.NAME: Fatigue
TheWarrior:Fatigue.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Doesn't discard at the end of the turn. At the end of your turn, draw 1 less card next turn.

TheWarrior:Taunt.NAME: Taunt
TheWarrior:Taunt.DESCRIPTION: Reduce all enemy's Vulnerable and Weakened to 1. gain strength this turn equal to stacks reduced.

TheWarrior:PoisonousDagger.NAME: Poisonous Dagger
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. When deal damage, give 2 Poison.

TheWarrior:PoisonousSword.NAME: Poisonous Sword
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. When deal damage, give 3 Poison.
Deal !D! damage. When deal damage, give 3 Poison.

TheWarrior:PoisonousAxe.NAME: Poisonous Axe
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. When deal damage, give 3 Poison.

TheWarrior:PoisonousHammer.NAME: Poisonous Hammer
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. When deal damage, give 4 Poison.

TheWarrior:Envenom.NAME: Envenom
TheWarrior:Envenom.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. This turn, whenever you deal attack damage to an enemy, give !M! Poison.

TheWarrior:SpikyHammer.NAME: Spiky Hammer
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, apply 40 Dazed and 4 Bleeding.

TheWarrior:BleedingPoison.NAME: Bleeding Poison
TheWarrior:BleedingPoison.DESCRIPTION: Give !M! Bleeding and !M! Poison to an enemy.

TheWarrior:PoisonousShield.NAME: Poisonous Shield
TheWarrior:PoisonousShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! * X block. Whenever receive damage, give !M! Poison. You cannot attack this turn.

TheWarrior:SpikyShield.NAME: Spiky Shield
TheWarrior:SpikyShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! * X block. Whenever receive damage, give !M! Bleeding. You cannot attack this turn.

TheWarrior:WoundInfection.NAME: Wound Infection
TheWarrior:WoundInfection.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you give Bleeding to an enemy, also give !M! Poison.

TheWarrior:BloodExcitement.NAME: Blood Excitement
TheWarrior:BloodExcitement.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you give Bleeding to an enemy, gain 1 strength this turn.

TheWarrior:SharpClaw.NAME: Sharp Claw
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Take 2 and deal !D! damage, apply 1 Bleeding.
Put a Wound into your draw pile. Give !M! Distracted.

TheWarrior:SharpDagger.NAME: Sharp Dagger
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and put a Dazed in your draw pile.

TheWarrior:HeavySword.NAME: Heavy Sword
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Put a Dazed into your draw pile.
Deal !D! damage. Put a Dazed into your draw pile.

TheWarrior:HeavyAxe.NAME: Heavy Axe
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Give !M! Distracted and put a Wound into your draw pile.

TheWarrior:HeavyHammer.NAME: Heavy Hammer
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, put a Fatigue and a Wound in your hand.

TheWarrior:WarCry.NAME: War Cry
TheWarrior:WarCry.DESCRIPTION: Discard all the status cards in your hand and gain 1 strength this turn for each.
TheWarrior:WarCry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard all the status cards in your hand and gain 1 strength this turn for each. Retain at the end of the turn.

TheWarrior:ShortClaw.NAME: Short Claw
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, if enemy has Bleeding, give 2 Poison.

TheWarrior:ShortDagger.NAME: Short Dagger
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. When deal damage, if enemy has Bleeding, give 2 Poison.

TheWarrior:ShortSword.NAME: Short Sword
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. When deal damage, if enemy has Bleeding, give 3 Poison.
Deal !D! damage. When deal damage, if enemy has Bleeding, give 3 Poison.

TheWarrior:LightAxe.NAME: Light Axe
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. When deal damage, if enemy has Poison, give 3 Bleeding.
Give !M! Distracted. When deal damage, if enemy has Poison, give 3 Bleeding.

TheWarrior:LightHammer.NAME: Light Hammer
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Distracted. When deal damage, if enemy has Poison, give 4 Bleeding.
Deal !D! damage. When deal damage, if enemy has Poison, give 4 Bleeding.

TheWarrior:WoundPain.NAME: Wound Pain
TheWarrior:WoundPain.DESCRIPTION: All enemy lose all their Bleeding and Poison. They receive damage equals to Bleeding stacks times Poison stacks. Exhaust.

TheWarrior:StrongHammer.NAME: Strong Hammer
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Distracted. Put a Fatigue in your hand.
Deal !D! damage. Put a Fatigue in your hand.

TheWarrior:Prepared.NAME: Prepared
TheWarrior:Prepared.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card, discard 2 cards. Give all enemy 2 Bleeding and !M! Poison for each status card discarded.
TheWarrior:Prepared.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 card, discard 3 cards. Give all enemy 2 Bleeding and !M! Poison for each status card discarded.

TheWarrior:SpecialClaw.NAME: Special Claw
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage or 3 more if enemy has Vulnerable.
Give !M! Distracted or 1 more if enemy has Weakened.

TheWarrior:SpecialDagger.NAME: Special Dagger
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, if enemy has Bleeding, deal double.

TheWarrior:SpecialSword.NAME: Special Sword
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If enemy has Bleeding, deal 50% more.
Deal !D! damage. If enemy has Bleeding, deal 50% more.

TheWarrior:SpecialAxe.NAME: Special Axe
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, plus 6 damage if enemy has Vulnerable.
Apply !M! Distracted, 1 more if enemy has Weakened.

TheWarrior:SpecialHammer.NAME: Special Hammer
TheWarrior:SpecialHammer.DESCRIPTION: Choose: Disarm or Hammer. If this card finishes a combo, gain 2 strength and exhaust.

TheWarrior:Bloody.NAME: Bloody
TheWarrior:Bloody.DESCRIPTION: Double the enemy's Bleeding stack amount. Exhaust.
TheWarrior:Bloody.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Triple the enemy's Bleeding stack amount. Exhaust.

TheWarrior:SpecialShield.NAME: Special Shield
TheWarrior:SpecialShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! * X block. Retain up to X cards, lose 3 blocks each. You cannot attack this turn.

TheWarrior:ScrapShield.NAME: Scrap Shield
TheWarrior:ScrapShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! * X block. Discard up to X cards, gain !B! block for each. Add a Slimed to draw pile. You cannot attack this turn.

TheWarrior:DesperateShield.NAME: Desperate Shield
TheWarrior:DesperateShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! * X block. Add 1 Fatigue to your hand and X dazed to your draw pile.

TheWarrior:BloodyBlade.NAME: Bloody Blade
TheWarrior:BloodyBlade.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal attack damage to an enemy, give 2 Bleeding.

TheWarrior:BloodyCloud.NAME: Bloody Cloud
TheWarrior:BloodyCloud.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, give all enemy !M! Bleeding.

TheWarrior:BloodyNature.NAME: Bloody Nature
TheWarrior:BloodyNature.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you give 1 stack Bleeding to an enemy, also deal !M! damage.

TheWarrior:WaveBladeSword.NAME: Wave Blade Sword
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply 5 Bleeding. Put a Wound into your draw pile.
Deal !D! damage, apply 10 Dazed and 5 Bleeding. Put a Wound into your draw pile.

TheWarrior:HalberdAxe.NAME: Halberd Axe
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a Dazed into your draw pile.
Give !M! Distracted. Add a Dazed into your draw pile.

TheWarrior:PreparingShield.NAME: Preparing Shield
TheWarrior:PreparingShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! * X block. Next turn, draw X/2 cards, gain X/2 energy. Next combo deal extra 5% * X damage per card. You cannot attack this turn.
TheWarrior:PreparingShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! * X block. Next turn, draw X/2 cards, gain X/2 energy. Next combo deal extra 7% * X damage per card. You cannot attack this turn.

TheWarrior:BloodyFumes.NAME: Bloody Fumes
TheWarrior:BloodyFumes.DESCRIPTION: Give all enemies 3 Poison, 3 Bleeding, 2 Weakened and 2 Vulnerable. Exhaust.
TheWarrior:BloodyFumes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Give all enemies 5 Poison, 5 Bleeding, 3 Weakened and 3 Vulnerable. Exhaust.

TheWarrior:Charge.NAME: Charge
TheWarrior:Charge.DESCRIPTION: Discard all status cards in your hand. Take 6 damage, gain 2 energy, draw 4 cards. Put a Wound into your draw pile. Exhaust.
TheWarrior:Charge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard all status cards in your hand. Take 6 damage, gain 3 energy, draw 6 cards. Put a Wound into your draw pile. Exhaust.

TheWarrior:ThrowAway.NAME: Throw Away
TheWarrior:ThrowAway.DESCRIPTION: Discard up to !M! cards, add a Dazed to your draw pile for each. If you discarded at least 3, gain 1 energy and draw 1 card. If you discarded at least 3 status cards, gain 1 Dexterity.

TheWarrior:DoubleCombo.NAME: Double Combo
TheWarrior:DoubleCombo.DESCRIPTION: Repeat your next combo with 50% faster speed, but can only deal damage and deal 25% less.

TheWarrior:Stronger.NAME: Stronger
TheWarrior:Stronger.DESCRIPTION: Start every combo as if you already played a card.
TheWarrior:Stronger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Start every combo as if you already played 2 cards.

TheWarrior:Faster.NAME: Faster
TheWarrior:Faster.DESCRIPTION: All enemies start their turn with !M! Distracted.

TheWarrior:ComboForm.NAME: Combo Form
TheWarrior:ComboForm.DESCRIPTION: When combo finish, gain 1 energy and draw 1 extra card.

TheWarrior:UltimateArmor.NAME: Ultimate Armor
TheWarrior:UltimateArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain X Metallicize and !M! * X Plated Armor. You cannot attack this turn.

TheWarrior:Anger.NAME: Anger
TheWarrior:Anger.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw 1 card, put a dazed into your draw pile.
TheWarrior:Anger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. At the start of your turn, draw 1 card, put a dazed into your draw pile.
